name: Flangry Bird
overview: Flangryt Bird 101 is an arcade-style game in which the player controls the bird Flangry, which moves persistently to the right. The player is tasked with navigating Flangry through pairs of pipes that have equally sized gaps placed at random heights. Flangry automatically descends and only ascends when the player taps the spacebar. Each times passes the player is awarded points. Colliding with a pipe or the ground ends the gameplay. The game gets faster when a lever is completed.
